summary.span: 表示 Windows 下拉式方塊控制項。

span.span: Represents a Windows combo box control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A會顯示在文字方塊中結合，可讓使用者從清單中選取項目，或輸入新的值。A displays a text box combined with a , which enables the user to select items from the list or enter a new value. 屬性會指定是否會一律顯示清單或清單是否顯示在下拉式清單中。The property specifies whether the list is always displayed or whether the list is displayed in a drop-down. 屬性也會指定是否可編輯的文字部分。The property also specifies whether the text portion can be edited. 請參閱可用的設定和其效果。See for the available settings and their effects. 沒有要永遠顯示清單，並不允許輸入新值的設定。There is no setting to always display the list and disallow entering a new value. 若要顯示可以加入任何新的值清單，請使用控制項。To display a list to which no new values can be added, use a control. 若要新增或移除清單中的物件，在執行階段，使用方法類別 (透過屬性)。To add or remove objects in the list at run time, use methods of the class (through the property of the ). 您可以將指派的物件參考的陣列方法。You can assign an array of object references with the method. 然後，清單會顯示每個物件的預設字串值。The list then displays the default string value for each object. 您可以加入具有個別物件方法。You can add individual objects with the method. 您可以刪除的項目方法或清除整個清單與方法。You can delete items with the method or clear the entire list with the method. 顯示和選取的功能，除了也提供功能，可讓您有效率地將項目加入並找出清單的項目內的文字。In addition to display and selection functionality, the also provides features that enable you to efficiently add items to the and to find text within the items of the list. 具有並方法，您可以新增項目，以大量不用每次重繪控制項項目新增至清單。With the and methods, you can add a large number of items to the without the control being repainted each time an item is added to the list. 和方法可讓您搜尋的清單，其中包含特定的搜尋字串中的項目。The and methods enable you to search for an item in the list that contains a specific search string. 您可以使用這些屬性來管理目前選取的項目在清單中，屬性來指定顯示在編輯欄位中，字串屬性來取得或設定目前的項目，而屬性來取得或設定參考的物件。You can use these properties to manage the currently selected item in the list, the property to specify the string displayed in the editing field, the property to get or set the current item, and the property to get or set a reference to the object. > [!NOTE] > 如果您有， ，或上基底 Windows Form 頁面上，而且想要修改這些控制項在衍生表單中的字串集合，這些控制項的基底表單中的字串集合必須空白。If you have a , , or on a base Windows Forms page and want to modify the string collections of those controls in a derived form, the string collections of those controls in the base form must be empty. 如果字串集合不是空的它們會成為唯讀時衍生另一種形式。If the string collections are not empty, they become read-only when you derive another form. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是完整的應用程式，顯示您可以使用方法，以將項目加入，則方法來尋找中的項目，和和方法有效率地將大量項目到。The following code example is a complete application showing how you can use the method to add items to a , the method to find items in a , and the and methods to efficiently add a large number items to a . 能夠儲存不同的顯示文字的值繼承自。The ability to store values that are different from displayed text is inherited from . 如需如何使用這項功能的範例，請參閱類別。For an example of how to use this feature, see the class. 您必須將參考加入`System.Drawing`和`System.Windows.Forms`執行此範例中的命名空間。You must add references to the `System.Drawing` and `System.Windows.Forms` namespaces to run this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用， ，並屬性，以建立，自動完成輸入的字串比較輸入中維護來源的所有字串的前置詞的前置詞。Use the , , and properties to create a that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source. 這適合用於所在 Url、 位址、 檔案名稱或命令會經常輸入的控制項。This is useful for controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered. 如果維護來源中有重複的項目，自動完成行為不正常。If there are duplicate entries in the maintained source, automatic completion behaves unpredictably. 善用屬性是選擇性的但是您必須設定屬性設`CustomSource`若要使用。The use of the property is optional, but you must set the property to `CustomSource` in order to use . 您必須使用和屬性放在一起。You must use the and properties together. > [!NOTE] > 作業系統可能會限制可同時顯示的自訂字串數目。The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once. 包含正斜線 （/） 或反斜線 (\\)，自動完成附加所有字元只，且包含斜線。For strings that contain a forward slash (/) or backward slash (\\), automatic completion appends all characters only up to and including the slash.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用， ，並屬性，以建立，自動完成輸入的字串比較輸入中維護來源的所有字串的前置詞的前置詞。Use the , , and properties to create a that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source. 這適合用於所在 Url、 位址、 檔案名稱或命令會經常輸入的控制項。This is useful for controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered. 如果維護來源中有重複的項目，自動完成行為不正常。If there are duplicate entries in the maintained source, automatic completion behaves unpredictably. 如果您設定要，清單才會顯示是或。If you set to , the list displays only if is or . 善用屬性是選擇性的但是您必須設定屬性設若要使用。The use of the property is optional, but you must set the property to in order to use . 您必須使用和屬性放在一起。You must use the and properties together. 具有設定為並設定為，行為如下所示：With set to and set to , the behavior is as follows: - 如果字串清單是空的按退格鍵或 DELETE 鍵沒有任何作用。If the list of strings is empty, pressing the BACKSPACE or DELETE key does nothing. - 如果按下退格鍵時少於一秒中，選取上一個項目時，或如果是空的字串清單選取任何項目。If the BACKSPACE key is pressed in less than one second, the previous item is selected, or nothing is selected if the list of string is empty. - 如果超過一秒內，按下退格鍵時，會選取第一個項目。If the BACKSPACE key is pressed in more than one second, the first item is selected. - 如果按下 DELETE 鍵時，會選取第一個項目。If the DELETE key is pressed, the first item is selected. > [!NOTE] > 作業系統可能會限制可同時顯示的自訂字串數目。The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once. 包含正斜線 （/） 或反斜線 (\\)，自動完成附加所有字元只，且包含斜線。For strings that contain a forward slash (/) or backward slash (\\), automatic completion appends all characters only up to and including the slash.

summary.span: 當項目一次一筆加入 時可維護效能。

span.span: Maintains performance when items are added to the one at a time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法，防止控制項被繪製直到呼叫方法。This method prevents the control from painting until the method is called. 將項目加入最好是使用方法類別 (透過屬性)。The preferred way to add items to the is to use the method of the class (through the property of the ). 這可讓您一次將項目陣列加入至清單。This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time. 不過，如果您想要新增項目在階段使用的其中一個方法類別，您可以使用方法，以防止控制項重繪每個項目新增至清單的時間。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method of the class, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the each time an item is added to the list. 完成的工作項目加入清單後，呼叫方法，以啟用重新繪製。Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the method to enable the to repaint. 將項目新增這種方式可以防止重繪閃動在繪製期間當正在大量的項目加入至清單。This way of adding items can prevent flicker during the drawing of the when a large number of items are being added to the list. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的使用方式和方法。The following code example shows the usage of the and methods. 範例是完整的程式碼範例的一部分類別概觀。The example is part of a complete code example in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

para.span: 當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將項目加入最好是使用方法類別 (透過屬性)。The preferred way to add items to the is to use the method of the class (through the property of the ). 這可讓您一次將項目陣列加入至清單。This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time. 不過，如果您想要新增項目在階段使用的其中一個方法類別，您可以使用方法，以防止控制項重繪每個項目新增至清單的時間。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method of the class, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the each time an item is added to the list. 完成的工作項目加入清單後，呼叫方法，以啟用重新繪製。Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the method to enable the to repaint. 新增項目可以防止這種 flickered 繪圖的當正在大量的項目加入至清單。This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the when a large number of items are being added to the list. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的使用方式和方法。The following code example shows the usage of the and methods. 範例是在程式碼範例的一部分類別概觀。The example is part of a code example in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所執行的搜尋不區分大小寫。The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive. `s`參數是用來比較下拉式方塊的清單中的項目相關聯的文字子字串。The `s` parameter is a substring to compare against the text associated with the items in the combo box list. 搜尋執行部分相符的文字，從頭開始，並傳回符合指定的子字串的清單中的第一個項目。The search performs a partial match starting from the beginning of the text, and returning the first item in the list that matches the specified substring. 然後，您就可以執行工作，例如移除項目，其中包含搜尋文字使用方法，或變更項目的文字。You can then perform tasks, such as removing the item that contains the search text using the method or changing the item's text. 一旦找到指定的文字，如果您想要搜尋的文字中的其他執行個體，您必須使用新版提供的參數指定起始的索引內的方法。Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the , you must use the version of the method that provides a parameter for specifying a starting index within the . 如果您想要執行的精確的字詞相符項目，而不是在部分符合的搜尋，使用方法。If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的使用方式方法和屬性。The following code example shows the usage of the method and property. 範例是完整的程式碼範例的一部分類別概觀。The example is part of a complete code example in the class overview. summary.span: 取得或設定在 的可編輯部分中選取的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is selected in the editable portion of a .

value.span: 字串，表示下拉式方塊中目前所選取的文字。

value.span: 如果 設定為 ，則傳回的值是空字串 ("")。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來擷取或變更目前選取的文字中控制項。You can use the property to retrieve or change the currently selected text in a control. 不過，您應該注意選取項目可以自動變更，因為使用者互動。However, you should be aware that the selection can change automatically because of user interaction. 例如，如果您擷取按鈕中的值事件處理常式中，值會是空字串。For example, if you retrieve the value in a button event handler, the value will be an empty string. 這是因為輸入的焦點從下拉式方塊移到按鈕時，就會自動清除選取項目。This is because the selection is automatically cleared when the input focus moves from the combo box to the button. 當下拉式方塊會失去焦點時，選取點移動至文字的開頭，並選取的文字會變成未選取。When the combo box loses focus, the selection point moves to the beginning of the text and any selected text becomes unselected. 在此情況下，取得屬性會擷取的空字串及設定屬性會將指定的值加入至文字的開頭。In this case, getting the property retrieves an empty string, and setting the property adds the specified value to the beginning of the text. 當下拉式方塊取得焦點時，會自動選取控制項中的完整文字。When the combo box gains focus, the full text in the control is automatically selected. 如果您呼叫控制項的設定輸入的焦點，全文檢索的方法選取不論控制項是否已經具有焦點。If you call the control's method to set the input focus, the full text is selected regardless of whether the control already had focus. 當使用者選取項目，從下拉式清單，或使用向上鍵和向下鍵時，會自動選取新項目的文字。When the user selects an item from the drop-down list or by using the UP ARROW and DOWN ARROW keys, the text for the new item is automatically selected. 不過，如果您嘗試取得中的值或事件處理常式中，屬性會傳回空字串。However, if you try to get the value in a or event handler, the property returns an empty string. 這是因為這些事件，在上一個已清除的值和新的值尚未設定。This is because, at the time of these events, the previous value has been cleared and the new value has not yet been set. 若要擷取目前的值或是事件處理常式，使用屬性改為。To retrieve the current value in a or event handler, use the property instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指定是否排序現有的項目，並將新的項目新增至清單中適當的排序位置。This property specifies whether the sorts existing entries and add new entries to the appropriate sorted position in the list. 您可以使用這個屬性，來自動排序中的項目。You can use this property to automatically sort items in a . 當項目加入至已排序，項目會移至已排序的清單中的適當位置。As items are added to a sorted , the items are moved to the appropriate location in the sorted list. 當您將屬性設定為`false`，新的項目加入至現有清單的結尾。When you set the property to `false`, new items are added to the end of the existing list. 不區分大小寫，而在依字母順序遞增順序排序。The sort is case-insensitive and in alphabetically ascending order. 嘗試設定將資料繫結控制項上引發。Attempting to set the property on a data-bound control raises an . 您必須使用排序資料的基礎資料模型。You must sort the data using the underlying data model.

exception.span: 嘗試對附加至資料來源的 進行排序。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用事件，以便驗證在實際顯示之前的文字。Use the event to validate the text before it is actually shown. 如果不會引發屬性以程式設計方式變更。 is not fired if the property is programmatically changed. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ComboBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ComboBox1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 處理 Windows 訊息。

span.span: Processes Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有訊息都會都傳送至方法之後取得透過篩選方法。All messages are sent to the method after getting filtered through the method. 方法完全對應於 Windows `WindowProc` 函式。The method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function. 如需有關處理 Windows 訊息的詳細資訊，請參閱 < `WindowProc` Windows Platform SDK 參考中的函式文件位於 MSDN library http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information about processing Windows messages, see the `WindowProc` function documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法以處理作業系統訊息中識別結構。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the structure. WM_ACTIVATEAPP 作業系統訊息會在此範例中得知另一個應用程式會變成作用中處理。The WM_ACTIVATEAPP operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. 位於 MSDN library 的 Platform SDK 文件參考是指http://msdn.microsoft.com/library若要了解可用， ，和值。Refer to the Platform SDK documentation reference located in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library to understand the available , , and values. 實際的常值可在 Windows.h 標頭檔包含在平台 SDK （Core SDK 一節） 下載中，位於 MSDN library，還有http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。Actual constant values can be found in the Windows.h header file included in the Platform SDK (Core SDK section) download, which is also available in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
